name: In Gods Hand
description:
A Game for The WOWIE Jam 4
Music by Nicolas Poggi ( instragram @nicopoggi_music).

In most Building  games you decide what to build and your minions do The work.
Not This time. here Ufo visits your undevelopd planet and orders you to build a civilization. 

Controlls:
WASD to Move
Hit Things with your Hand by Moving your Curser to get Resources.
Right Click to pick up items
